pullrequest.title: Update control sync tutorial sample code and launch file to work with atlas v4/v5

content.html:
The feature are wondering about is multiple subplots, one for each of the 5 signals, from one invocation of rqt_plot. Currently the command in the tutorial displays 5 signals on the same plot.

@namniart's post on this ROS answers thread from August says that there is no direct support for subplots in rqt_plot. However, @dirk-thomas mentioned a workaround for this on Github by using multiple instances of the plugin.

We should attempt to use that strategy, and we should explicitly mention that rxplot is unavailable in Groovy and later and rqt_plot should be used instead.
